tacos.title: Carne Asada Tacos
tacos.description: 3 soft-shell 4 inch corn tortilla garnished with flank steak, white onion, cilantro and french fries on the side.
tacos.detailedDescription: Perfectly grilled flank steak marinated in our secret blend of spices, served on authentic corn tortillas with fresh white onions and cilantro. Chef's favorite!

tacos.title: Pollo Asado Tacos
tacos.description: 3 soft shell 4 inch corn tortilla with grilled chicken, white onion, cilantro and french fries on the side.
tacos.detailedDescription: Tender grilled chicken breast marinated in citrus and herbs, topped with fresh onions and cilantro. A crowd favorite!

tacos.title: Chorizo Tacos
tacos.description: 3 soft shell 4 inch corn tortilla filled with Mexican sausage, white onion, cilantro and french fries on the side.
tacos.detailedDescription: Authentic Mexican chorizo with a bold, smoky flavor that packs a punch. Not for the faint of heart!

tacos.title: Veggie Supreme Tacos
tacos.description: 3 soft shell corn tortillas filled with grilled vegetables, black beans, and fresh guacamole.
tacos.detailedDescription: A delicious plant-based option featuring seasonal grilled vegetables, creamy black beans, and house-made guacamole.

burritos.title: Carne Asada Burrito
burritos.description: Flank steak, black beans, lettuce, jalapeno, ranchero sauce, sour cream, avocado mayonnaise & side fries.
burritos.detailedDescription: A massive burrito stuffed with tender carne asada, seasoned black beans, and all the fixings. Comes with crispy fries.

burritos.title: Pollo Asado Burrito
burritos.description: Grilled chicken, black beans, lettuce, jalapeno, ranchero sauce, sour cream, avocado mayonnaise & side fries.
burritos.detailedDescription: Grilled chicken breast wrapped with beans, rice, and fresh toppings in a warm flour tortilla. Satisfying and delicious!

burritos.title: Chorizo Burrito
burritos.description: Mexican sausage, black beans, lettuce, jalapeno, ranchero sauce, sour cream, avocado mayonnaise & side fries.
burritos.detailedDescription: Bold and spicy chorizo burrito loaded with beans, rice, and zesty toppings. For those who love heat!

burritos.title: Bean & Cheese Burrito
burritos.description: Refried beans, Mexican rice, melted cheese, lettuce, and salsa wrapped in a warm flour tortilla.
burritos.detailedDescription: A vegetarian classic! Creamy refried beans and melted cheese with rice and fresh veggies. Simple and satisfying.

quesadillas.title: Carnitas Quesadilla
quesadillas.description: A 10 inch tortilla filled with pulled pork, Monterrey Jack cheese, garnished with sour cream, lettuce, ranchera sauce and side fries.
quesadillas.detailedDescription: Slow-cooked pulled pork with melted Monterrey Jack cheese in a crispy tortilla. Rich, savory, and incredibly satisfying!

quesadillas.title: Chicken Quesadilla
quesadillas.description: Grilled chicken and melted cheese in a crispy flour tortilla, served with sour cream and salsa.
quesadillas.detailedDescription: Classic chicken quesadilla with perfectly melted cheese. A fan favorite that never disappoints!

quesadillas.title: Veggie Quesadilla
quesadillas.description: Grilled peppers, onions, mushrooms, and melted cheese in a crispy tortilla with guacamole and sour cream.
quesadillas.detailedDescription: Loaded with fresh grilled vegetables and gooey melted cheese. A delicious vegetarian option!
